feature.label: EFSM Testability-Transform-Based Test Generation
feature.description:
This feature includes EFSM (Testability-Transformation-Based Test Generation) that helps generating tests from logs using: 1) Model inference 2) Model transformation to code for test generation 3) Use branch coverage test generation (EVOSUITE) to generate tests to cover the transformed model 4) Transform evosuite tests to target executable tests
------------- Change logs: v1.0.0 - created
